mods.abstract: Brother Elzear Stephen Stephen Kelly sits for a photograph. He was president from 1914-1915. It was a short tenure but a momentous one, as he oversaw the closing of the college division, leaving CBC a high school only until the opening of the Junior College in 1940.
mods.accessCondition: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law. For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
